item.title: By: Evil M
item.dc:creator: Evil M
item.description: The issue with locks (and any class really) is that for every 5 that are good, there are 20 who think their talent tree is made of pine.
item.content:encoded: The issue with locks (and any class really) is that for every 5 that are good, there are 20 who think their talent tree is made of pine.

item.title: By: Gheist
item.dc:creator: Gheist
item.description: What's even more fun is watching (on a tank and spank fight) warlocks unleashing 1500-1800 dps when I'm good if I get 1200 as a rogue in the same raid. Dunno why we just don't stock up with 10 warlocks and be damned with the rest of the dps. If I wasn't the guild leader I'd probably not take any rogues anyway :/
item.content:encoded: What’s even more fun is watching (on a tank and spank fight) warlocks unleashing 1500-1800 dps when I’m good if I get 1200 as a rogue in the same raid. Dunno why we just don’t stock up with 10 warlocks and be damned with the rest of the dps. If I wasn’t the guild leader I’d probably not take any rogues anyway :/
